detail.content: NYU                                                                                                           Home         |         Forms         |         Standard Services         |         Special Services                                     Contact Us                           News &      Announcements              Postal Charge-Back Slip      Stamp Requisition Form -Save PDF before use-      USPS Quick Tips      Personal Mail Policy       Sustainability                                      547 LaGuardia Pl, New York, NY 10012 · Tel: 212.998.1010                       About Logistics and Distribution Services New York University processes an average of 125,000 pieces of mail and packages each day – an amount equivalent in complexity and mail volume to that of a small city. Service is provided to all on and off-campus University locations. Policies and procedures developed over the years and keeping abreast of updated and changing technology, allows Logistics and Distribution Services staff to process mail quickly and economically.    *Lobby Service hours 8:30 AM - 5:30 PM Monday - Friday*                                      NEW:    Shipping Hazardous Materials                             Unless otherwise noted, all content copyright New York University.
